mapper.update: update ecs_brand set brand_name = #{brand_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_logo = #{brand_logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_img = #{brand_img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_url = #{site_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_order = #{sort_order,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_show = #{is_show,jdbcType=BIT}, brand_desc = #{brand_desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, wap_brand_desc = #{wap_brand_desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where brand_id = #{brand_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select brand_id, brand_name, brand_logo, brand_img, site_url, sort_order, is_show, brand_desc, wap_brand_desc from ecs_brand where brand_id = #{brand_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
select brand_id, brand_name, brand_logo, brand_img, site_url, sort_order, is_show, brand_desc, wap_brand_desc from ecs_brand
